title: Oswald the Lucky Rabbit in the Cross-Country Quest
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt darkmode=a|hidetitle=a]]

[[module css]]
.script {
   font-family: 'Andale Mono', 'Courier New', Courier, monospace;
   font-size: 1.1em;
   outline: 2px solid rgba(130, 130, 130, 0.4);
   padding: 1.5em 3.5em;
}

.script p { margin: 0em; }

.fadein {
   margin: 2em 0em 0.5em;
   text-transform: uppercase;
}

.scene {
   margin: 1.5em 0em 1em;
   text-transform: uppercase;
 }

.action {
   margin: 1em 0em 1.5em;
}

.dialog {
   margin: 0em 27.5% 1.25em;
   display: grid;
   grid-template-areas:
      "char"
      "text";
}

.dialog-dual {
   margin: 0em 0em 1.25em;
   display: grid;
   grid-template-columns: 1fr 5% 1fr;
   grid-template-areas:
      "char1 sp char2"
      "text1 sp text2";
}

.char, .char1, .char2 {
   text-transform: uppercase;
   line-height: 0.85em;
   margin: auto;
   padding: 0em 3em;
   position: relative;
}

.char { grid-area: char; }
.char1 { grid-area: char1; }
.char2 { grid-area: char2; }

.cont { left: 2.2vw; }
.cont p::after { content: " (CONT'D)"; }

.dtext { grid-area: text; }
.dtext1 { grid-area: text1; }
.dtext2 { grid-area: text2; }

.paren {
   text-transform: none;
   line-height: 1em;
   padding: 0em 2.2vw;
}
.paren::before { content:"( "; }
.paren::after { content:" )"; }

.transition {
   text-transform: uppercase;
   align: right;
}
[[/module]]
@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
The documents below were discovered in the Walt Disney Company Archives on 2023/01/02. Due to its unknown origin, emission of Aspect Radiation (ARad)[[footnote]]EVE emissions intense enough to alter reality. This is the basis of Applied Thaumatology.[[/footnote]], and atemporal themes[[footnote]]Tests have shown that the documents are from the time period and otherwise authentic.[[/footnote]], the Walt Disney Company reached out to Foundation archivists for further input.

-Researcher Mordecai Ryder Site-55, Thaumaturgic Art and Literature Department
[[/div]]

@@ @@
[[div style="border:solid 1px gray; background: gray; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px; color:black"]]
[[=]]

++++ **##9a0300|NOTICE FROM THE FOUNDATION RECORDS AND INFORMATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION##**
Reviewers be advised that this document contains cognitohazards, cartoon violence, and drug use.
@@ @@
â€” Maria Jones, Director, **##9a0300|RAISA##**
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="document"]]
[[div class="script"]]

[[=]]
[[size 225%]]Oswald the Lucky Rabbit in[[/size]]

[[size 90%]]Wild, Wild West[[/size]]
by
[[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]The Author[[/span]]
[[/=]]

------

[[=]]
[[size 130%]]__Cast of Characters__[[/size]]
[[/=]]

||[[size 105%]]__OSWALD:__[[/size]]||
||Toonie manifest into Baseline Reality. To blend in, he wears an oversized hoodie and a mask. He's managed to preserve some of his cartoon-like magic. Has no idea how he ended up in this reality and is searching for a rabbit hole to Cartoonland.||

||[[size 105%]]__MUSIC__:[[/size]]||
|| Actor in black body suit playing a musical instrument. ||

||[[size 105%]]__CLUB GOERS__:[[/size]]||
|| Club patrons in a line outside the establishment. They are dressed in early 2020's West Coast club fashion. ||

||[[size 105%]]__CLUB GOER__:[[/size]]||
|| Club patron in a line outside the establishment. They flirt with Oswald, and aren't aware that he is a toon. ||

||[[size 105%]]__BOUNCER__:[[/size]]||
|| Just tryin' to do his job. He bounces. ||

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="document"]]
[[div class="script"]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@


[[=]]
[[size 130%]]__Scene__:[[/size]] Alleyway in Los Angeles[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[size 130%]]__Time__:[[/size]] Late Night
[[/=]]
------
[[>]]
[[size 75%]]
I-1-1
[[/size]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
[[size 130%]]__ACT I__[[/size]]
@@@@
[[size 130%]]__Scene 1__[[/size]]
[[/=]]

||[[size 120%]]SETTING:[[/size]]||
||OSWALD SEARCHES for a rabbit hole back to Cartoonland. He is currently ASLEEP.||

||[[size 120%]]AT PRESENT:[[/size]]||
||OSWALD AWAKES in a Los Angeles alleyway. LOUD club music ECHOES down a few blocks.||

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
FADE IN:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
EXT. ALLEYWAY - LATE NIGHT
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD TOSSES and TURNS in his cardboard box. He COVERS his ears and ROLLS in bed.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
MUSIC
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(MUSIC THUMPS and BUMPS, this SHAKES, and RATTLES, the ground.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD PULLS a comedically large pocket watch from behind his back. An eye JUTS out from his head.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
MUSIC
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(MUSIC THUMPS and BUMPS, this SHAKES, and RATTLES, the ground.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD SITS up and CRAWLS out from his box.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
CUT TO:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
EXT. CLUB IN LA - LATE NIGHT
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="scene"]]
(MUSIC is LOUD. There is a line of CLUB GOERS wrapping around the block. OSWALD peeks his head around the corner. He RUBS his chin, SNAPS his fingers, and SPINS around quickly. When he STOPS spinning, he wears a hoodie and a mask. OSWALD, with intent to SABOTAGE the MUSIC, SETS OUT toward the source.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD QUEUES in line. PEEKS his head out and he SEES a BOUNCER at the start of the line.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOERS
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(CLUB GOERS chatter in front of OSWALD. One CLUB GOER OPENS a small, cylindrical container and candy from it. The CLUB GOER PLACES it in their mouth. Same CLUB GOER NOTICES OSWALD behind them.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD REACHES the BOUNCER. OSWALD WAVES his hand and SAUNTERS.)
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="document"]]
[[div class="script"]]

------
[[>]]
[[size 75%]]
I-1-2
[[/size]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
BOUNCER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(BOUNCER SURPRISED.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
And where do ya think ya goin'?
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(BOUNCER PULLS OSWALD by his collar.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
What's ya name? 
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(POKES head from front doors.) 
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
Oh, he's uh, he's with me.
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
BOUNCER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
Sure, whatever.
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD WAVES again and WALTZES inside.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
CUT TO:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
INT. CLUB IN LA - LATE NIGHT
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
Hey! You can hang with us until your friends get here.
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD SCANS the club. Realizing it'll take some SLEUTHING to SABOTAGE the MUSIC-- he JOINS the CLUB GOER.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
FADE OUT:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
INT. CLUB IN LA - LATE NIGHT
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="document"]]
[[div class="script"]]

------
[[>]]
[[size 75%]]
I-1-3
[[/size]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
FADE IN:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
INT. CLUB IN LA - ONE HOUR LATER
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD DANCES with the CLUB GOER)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(SIGHS) 
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
I'm exhausted! You have some stamina.
[[/div]]

[[div class="scene"]]
(CON'T)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
Hey, would you like to do something fun?
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD not wanting to be OUTED trying to SABOTAGE, NODS his head.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
Follow me.
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(CLUB GOER LEADS OSWALD toward the back of the club to a secluded booth.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="scene"]]
(Shot follows OSWALD and the CLUB GOER as they head to the back of the club.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(CLUB GOER SITS in the booth.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
When did you move here?
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="document"]]
[[div class="script"]]

------
[[>]]
[[size 75%]]
I-1-4
[[/size]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD SITS, LOOKS at CLUB GOER and SHRUGS)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
You're from here?
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD TENTATIVELY NODS his head)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
So... would you like to try something fun?
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD CAUTIOUSLY NODS his head.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
MUSIC
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(MUSIC THUMPS and BUMPS, this SHAKES, and RATTLES, the ground.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD GLANCES near the MUSIC source.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(CLUB GOER REMOVES the cylinder seen prior and POURS sugar candy on the table)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
You're welcome to try one.
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD GLANCES near the MUSIC again, and then TAKES a piece.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD EATS the candy and SHIVERS.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(LAUGHS)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
You're not supposed to chew it!
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(MUSIC GETS louder, CLUB GOER LEANS toward OSWALD)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
It'll take about five minutes! Then we'll dance again!
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD confusedly LOOKS at the sugar candy, then back at CLUB GOER)
[[/div]]

###c5c5c5|--Five minutes until what?--##

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="scene"]]
(FIVE MINUTES later, OSWALD starts to YAWN, CLUB GOER continues YAPPING.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD YAWNS and NODS in and out of SLEEP.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
CLUB GOER
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(CLUB GOER's SPEECH is [[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]GARBLED[[/span]].)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD SEES DOUBLE as spirals appear above his head.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
(BLACKOUT)
(END OF SCENE)
[[/=]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[image http://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/oswald-the-lucky-rabbit-in-pdcon-2025/IMG_5690.png]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[div class="document"]]
[[div class="script"]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[size 130%]]__Cast of Characters__[[/size]]
[[/=]]

||[[size 105%]]__OSWALD__:[[/size]]||
|| Toonie manifest into Baseline Reality. To blend in, he wears an oversized hoodie and a mask. He's managed to preserve some of his cartoon-like magic. Has no idea how he ended up in this reality. ||

||[[size 105%]]__STEAMBOAT__:[[/size]]||
|| Toonie manifest in Baseline Reality with the explicit goal of murdering Oswald. He wears an oversized cowboy outfit and a mask. ||

||[[size 105%]]__[[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]] ##blue|The Navy Nixie##[[/span]]__:[[/size]]||
|| The ZEITGEIST of the JOY Disney animations et other media, have given to generations. ||

||[[size 105%]]##red|__THE LURKING FEAR__:##[[/size]]||
|| The ZEITGEIST of the TERROR Disney animations et other media, have given to generations. ||

||[[size 105%]]__STORE ATTENDANT__:[[/size]]||
|| Usually bored. ||

||[[size 105%]]__TOURIST 1 & 2__:[[/size]]||
||TOURIST 1 and 2 are going on a cross-country trip.||

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="document"]]
[[div class="script"]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
[[size 130%]]__Scene__:[[/size]] N/A [[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=]]
[[size 130%]]__Time__:[[/size]] N/A
[[/=]]
------
[[>]]
[[size 75%]]
I-2-1
[[/size]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
[[size 130%]]__ACT I__[[/size]]
@@@@
[[size 130%]]__Scene 2__[[/size]]
[[/=]]

||[[size 120%]]SETTING:[[/size]]||
|| OSWALD is in an unknown rabbit hole. ||

||[[size 120%]]AT PRESENT:[[/size]]||
|| OSWALD falls into a void. ||

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD HEARS a voice in the far distance in the dark.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
[[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]##blue|The Sapphire Sprite##[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
##blue|Dreams from you I do beseech,
Knowledge that lies beyond my reach--##
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(The ##blue|VOICE## MANIFESTS before OSWALD and RADIATES blue)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
[[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]##blue|The Azul Angel##[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
##blue|Troubled thoughts beyond my heart,
Reveal now those thoughts in part.##
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
FADE IN:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
INT. DREAMLANDS - N/A
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="scene"]]
(SMOG billows and is illuminated by [[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]##blue|The Azure Aziza##[[/span]]'s light. The SMOG shifts into an image of a skeleton crowned in horns riding a skeletal horse.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
[[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]##blue|The Teal Tien##[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
##red|The Lurking Fear##...
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
##red|THE LURKING FEAR:##
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(##red|THE LURKING FEAR## SHIFTS to an eerily familiar MOUSE silhouette. ##red|THE LURKING FEAR## looks through a magnifying glass.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
[[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]##blue|The Baltic Bluecap##[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
##blue|...He's searching...##
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="scene"]]
(The vision shifts into a silhouette of a [[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]##red|BEAR##[[/span]] chasing a silhouette of a RABBIT. Images morph together into a rabbit hole, then a towering city skyline flanked by a large statue of a lady. A flash and then a [[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]BEAR[[/span]] CATCHING the RABBIT and IMPRISONING it. ##red|THE LURKING FEAR##'s gloved hands STRANGLE the world.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
[[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]##blue|The Lapis Lazavik##[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
##blue|Another rabbit hole will appear in Old New Amsterdam, when## ##red|The Lurking Fear## ##blue|emerges in less than a year.##
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD PANICS.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
[[span style="filter: blur(8px);"]]##blue|The Peri Peri##[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
##blue|Hero with the swift warning. Be cunning and full of tricks!##
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(CON'T)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dtext"]]
##red|The Lurking Fear## ##blue|wants to absorb this reality. Hurry, dear Oswald, to the East! For the Herald of Fear, even now, nips at your heels.##
[[/div]]


@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="scene"]]
(The vision shifts and UP OSWALD FALLS. He WAKES in the alleyway, in his box.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="scene"]]
(BLACKOUT)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="document"]]
[[div class="script"]]

------

[[>]]
[[size 75%]]
I-2-2
[[/size]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
FADE IN:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
EXT. LOVE'S GAS STATION - LATE MORNING
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
STEAMBOAT
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(STEAMBOAT STEPS foot on the asphalt and LOOKS at his surroundings.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
TOURIST 1 & 2
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(CHATTERING with EACH OTHER as they enter the STORE.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
STEAMBOAT
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(STEAMBOAT SIGHS. STEAMBOAT PULLS out a comedically oversized magnifying glass. STEAMBOAT INSPECTS the ground.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
CUT TO:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
INT. GREYHOUND BUS - LATE MORNING
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(LEANS BACK in bus chair WHISTLING to himself.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
CUT TO:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
EXT. LOVE'S GAS STATION - LATE MORNING
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
STEAMBOAT
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(STEAMBOAT INSPECTS the buses and FINDS candy covered rabbit tracks in the dirt. STEAMBOAT FOLLOWS the rabbit tracks into LOVE'S. The tracks LEAD to an aisle of candy.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
STORE ATTENDANT
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(STORE ATTENDANT CLEANS melted chocolate and candy wrappers. Empty candy boxes LITTER the aisle.)
[[/div]]

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
STEAMBOAT
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(FLAILS trying to get the STORE ATTENDANT's ATTENTION.)
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="fadein"]]
CUT TO:
[[/div]]
[[div class="scene"]]
INT. GREYHOUND BUS - LATE MORNING
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="dialog"]]
[[div class="char"]]
OSWALD
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="action"]]
(OSWALD EATS truffles out of a paper-bag.)
